question: Did this person’s parent ({{ deceasedName }}’s child) die before {{ deceasedName }}?
hintText: {{ deceasedName }}’s grandchildren are only entitled to apply if their parent ({{ deceasedName }}’s child) died before {{ deceasedName }}.

diedEngOrWales.required: Answer ‘yes’ if the person who died lived in England or Wales or intended to return here
